name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Software Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in delivering high-performance applications tailored to the healthcare and financial sectors. Expertise in **MEAN** stack development, proficient in **TypeScript**, **HTML**, **SASS**, **Angular**, **React**, **Node.js**, **Express**, and **MongoDB**. Proven ability in developing robust and scalable applications using **AWS** (including **EC2**, **S3**, **Lambda**, and **RDS**), and containerization with **Docker**.

Strong experience in event messaging with **RabbitMQ** and **Kafka** and in-memory data management utilizing **Redis**. Skilled in implementing CI/CD pipelines using **Git**, **GitFlow**, and **Bitbucket**, and proficient in project management with **Jira** and **Confluence**. Familiar with modern build tools like **Webpack** and **Rollup**, and testing frameworks like **Jasmine** and **Puppeteer**.

Knowledgeable in deploying secure applications adhering to **OWASP**, **Section508**, and **WCAG** standards. Recognized for leveraging cloud-native systems in conjunction with **Terraform** for infrastructure as code and container orchestration with **Kubernetes (K8S)**. Adept at integrating best practices in agile development methodologies, complemented by a solid background in compliance-driven development and strong collaboration skills.

experience.responsibilities:
Constructed full-stack applications using the **MEAN** stack with a focus on **MongoDB**, **Node.js**, **Angular**, and **Express**, ensuring timely feature delivery and system stability.
Utilized **TypeScript** and **SASS** to develop responsive and maintainable frontend interfaces while adhering to best design practices and standards.
Implemented state management effectively using **Redux** and integrated real-time data processing supported by **RabbitMQ** and **Kafka** to enhance application performance.
Facilitated cloud deployment solutions leveraging **AWS** services such as **EC2**, **S3**, and **Lambda**, guaranteeing high availability and scalability in operational environments.
Designed and maintained containerized applications using **Docker** and orchestrated deployments with **Kubernetes (K8S)** to streamline CI/CD workflows including **GitFlow** and **Git**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams utilizing **Jira** and **Confluence** for agile project management and documentation, driving clear communication and project transparency.
Implemented robust testing protocols using **Jasmine**, **Puppeteer**, **TSLint**, and **ESLint** to ensure code quality, maintainability, and adherence to security best practices outlined by **OWASP**.
Built modular workflows with **TerraForm** to automate infrastructure setup and configuration management, ensuring consistency in various environments.
Embedded accessibility standards including **Section508** and **WCAG** into all software solutions, resulting in improved usability and compliance for diverse user bases.
Enhanced application performance by optimizing number of API calls and reducing page load times by **20%**, increasing user engagement and satisfaction.

Utilized **TypeScript**, **React** (18), and **Node.js** (Express) to modernize core financial platforms, migrating to **microservices** architecture that improved scalability and performance for high-volume transactional systems by **30%**.
Designed and built interactive front-end applications with **Angular**, **Vue 3**, **Next.js**, and **SASS**, optimizing user interfaces for financial tools and admin panels to enhance user experience by **25%**.
Implemented real-time analytics dashboards using **React**, **D3.js**, and **Power BI Embedded** to provide operations teams with insights into transactions and anomalies, improving response times by **40%**.
Engineered a robust event-driven architecture with **Kafka**, **RabbitMQ**, and **Azure Service Bus**, improving asynchronous communication across critical workflows such as payments and alerts by reducing latency by **20%**.
Developed ETL pipelines using **Python**, **Apache Airflow**, and **Azure Data Factory** to ingest financial data from diverse sources, supporting both batch and real-time processing with an **80%** increase in data efficiency.
Built and deployed machine learning models for fraud detection using **scikit-learn**, **XGBoost**, and **Azure ML**, enabling proactive detection of suspicious activity based on user behavior and transaction patterns with an accuracy rate of **95%**.
Created ML pipelines for real-time credit scoring and transaction classification, leveraging **MLflow** and **Airflow** for model inference integration into backend services, successfully reducing processing times by **50%**.

• Utilized **MEAN** stack technologies including **Node.js** (with **Express**) and **MongoDB** to design and implement robust backend services for a global e-commerce platform, achieving **99.99% availability** across critical functions such as checkout and order fulfillment.
• Developed dynamic and interactive UI components using **Angular** and **React** (v18) with **TypeScript**, ensuring responsive and accessible user interfaces that comply with **WCAG 2.1**.
• Enhanced data processing and connectivity using **RabbitMQ** and **Kafka**, enabling real-time order updates and improving customer engagement metrics by **30%**.
• Engineered distributed database solutions leveraging **AWS RDS**, **Redis**, and **Docker**, achieving **75% faster data retrieval** and maintaining performance under high traffic with numerous transactions per minute.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines with **Git**, **Bitbucket**, and **Jira** to streamline deployment processes, reduce rollout time by **40%**, and enhance collaboration across development teams.
• Applied **Terraform** and **K8S** for infrastructure as code, ensuring consistent deployment environments and significantly improving resource management and scaling capabilities.
• Integrated automated testing frameworks (**Jasmine**, **Puppeteer**) to validate applications, increasing test coverage to **90%** and reducing deployment bugs by **50%**.
• Maintained security standards across the platform using **OWASP** guidelines and implemented role-based access control (RBAC) and **OAuth 2.0**, safeguarding user data in compliance with **GDPR** regulations.
• Created SEO-friendly web applications utilizing **HTML5**, **SASS**, and modern JavaScript tooling with **Webpack** and **Rollup**, resulting in improved search engine rankings and user acquisition by **20%**.
